channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Explainer-What happens after the TikTok ban?
Elon Musk’s Starlink wifi to arrive on United Airlines this spring
LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: What proof must credit card debt collectors provide for a debt?
item.description: Debt collectors must provide proof that a debt is valid. Otherwise, they have to stop their collection efforts.

item.title: Winter storm brings power outages, leaves utilities customers in the dark
item.description: Hundreds of thousands of households across southern and eastern U.S. states were without power Monday.

item.title: Justin Trudeau says he'll resign as prime minister of Canada
item.description: The development comes a month after Canada's deputy prime minister, Chrystia Freeland, resigned suddenly from Trudeau's cabinet.

item.title: Trump asks judge to halt sentencing in his criminal hush money case
item.description: President-elect Trump has asked the judge overseeing his criminal hush money case in New York to halt his sentencing in the case, currently set for Fr...

item.title: Congestion pricing begins in New York City
item.description: New York City's first-in-the-nation congestion pricing plan has gone into effect. CBS News reporter Elijah Westbrook has more.

item.title: "The Brutalist," "Emilia Perez" and Demi Moore among Golden Globe winners
item.description: Demi Moore accepted her first-ever Golden Globe award for her role in the horror movie "The Substance." Other big winners include the musical "Emilia ...

item.title: Biden is traveling to New Orleans following the French Quarter attack that killed 14 and injured 30

item.title: Watch: Iranian woman grabs cleric’s turban and wraps it round her head after hijab comments

item.title: Major winter storm covers 13 states, breaking snowfall records as it moves east
item.description: A major winter storm that has been breaking snowfall records in the Midwest is moving east, bringing with it a heavy mix of snow and ice.
